price: (6) Not a [single] city which We destroyed believed before them,[872] so will they believe?
arabic: مَآ ءَامَنَتۡ قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآۖ أَفَهُمۡ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: [872]- Even though they had witnessed signs and miracles.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: mā āmanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknāhā afahum yu'minūna
